Articles.Content:
So, while I was taking a quick break from building my Constellation mission pack, I was playing around with planes, and I came up with this: Fun, maneuverable, and cute.

![DMUq9Fk.png](http://i.imgur.com/DMUq9Fk.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/IFzYe)

Enjoy!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Bush-plane)

If you like this craft, take a look at AMRSD's other products:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29%28NOW-HIRING%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29%28NOW-HIRING%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:18:07Z" title="06/27/2015 03:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

Lovely cockpit and unique propeller design, I like it! I'd give you some more rep if I could, but "You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to Mad Rocket Scientist again."

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Lovely cockpit and unique propeller design, I like it! I'd give you some more rep if I could, but "You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to Mad Rocket Scientist again."
> ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Thank you! If you want to give rep to someone extremely worthy, take a look at the awesome craft over here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124472-Constellation-Mission-Packs-Discussion-Thread%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124472-Constellation-Mission-Packs-Discussion-Thread%21)

Wow, never seen such a type of plane in the Spacecraft Exchange for quite a while ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Repped!

Those Comms really do provide lots of potential for aesthetics. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Nice,

i wanna see a firespitter version , but keep the hypermodern cockpit ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Wow, never seen such a type of plane in the Spacecraft Exchange for quite a while ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Repped!
> Those Comms really do provide lots of potential for aesthetics. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Thank you! I'm very happy with how the prop came out, especially with such a low part count.

> 
> Nice,
> i wanna see a firespitter version , but keep the hypermodern cockpit ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Thanks, I don't have firespitter installed, but I'll consider it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Nice job! I love it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks! I love your WWII replica project!

> 
> Thanks! I love your WWII replica project!

Thank you! It would be interesting to do a collaborative small civilian airplane series sometime in the future if you're interested...

> 
> Thank you! It would be interesting to do a collaborative small civilian airplane series sometime in the future if you're interested...

Yeah, that sounds like fun! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
